backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, networks, transmissions, access control, and related state with authorization checks and profile save/query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, impacted files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/docs/deployments/README.md: Index of production deployment records outlining deployment history, processes, access info, and monitoring guidance.
frontend/docs/deployments/version-30-pro: Deployment record for Version 30 documenting a clean production deployment, verification steps, and post-deployment checks.
frontend/docs/deployments/version-55-pro: Deployment record for Version 55 covering promotion details, canister info, verification results, and production access information.
frontend/docs/deployments/version-56-pro: Production deployment record for Version 56 detailing canister info, deployment steps, verification tasks, and key features such as enhanced authorization handling.
frontend/docs/droidstar-settings-referen: Reference describing how the app replicates DroidStar client behavior for server lists, caching, UI population, and connection consistency without reverse engineering.
frontend/docs/promotions/README.md: Index of all preview‑to‑production promotions with status, history, workflows, and verification checklists, highlighting Version 56 as current production.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-23-prev: Promotion record for Version 23 outlining required pre‑promotion verification across authentication, Connect pages, PTT, activity, and settings.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-30-prev: Promotion record for Version 30 including attestation of no code changes and extensive preview verification checklists for all major app areas.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-55-prev: Promotion record for Version 55 with completed verification of authentication, Connect tabs, Digital Voice presets, PTT behavior, and related functionality.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-56-prev: Records verification results for promoting version 56 preview build to production across all app pages and PWA features.
frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-product: Runbook detailing required checks and steps for promoting a preview deployment to production without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up PWA metadata and loads the main React application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page shown when the app has no network connection.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and fetch handlers for caching and offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication flow handling, redirects, and page layout composition.
frontend/src/auth/authClientStorage.ts: Provides namespaced localStorage adapter and utilities for regenerated Internet Identity auth data.
frontend/src/auth/iiAuthProvider.tsx: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling client initialization, login flow, and session state.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Implements a React error boundary that shows a styled error screen with reset and session-clearing options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with header, footer, navigation, and authentication-aware menu visibility.
Displays a segmented audio level meter driven by microphone input via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedFlo: Renders a fallback UI when authenticated backend operations fail, providing retry and session-clear actions.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Protects authenticated routes, handling login prompts, actor initialization errors, and session-clearing actions.
frontend/src/components/AutoGatewayStatu: Shows gateway auto-configuration status based on detected presets and displays related info.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Wraps children in a console-style accent panel for consistent UI styling.
Renders a styled page header with title, subtitle, and optional icon for various app sections.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceConn: A complex form component for configuring and saving Digital Voice (DMR/TGIF/BrandMeister) connections, including credentials, gateway fields, presets, and auto-loading saved settings.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceSave: Displays the user's saved Digital Voice configuration with validation warnings and gateway status, offering an option to edit settings.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Provides a searchable, filterable directory of networks and talkgroups with favorites support and selection handlers.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Form for configuring and saving IAX/DVSwitch connection settings, including hostname, credentials, codec, and advanced AllStar fields.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchSaved: Shows saved IAX/DVSwitch configuration details with masked passwords and gateway status, and allows navigating to edit.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Handles PWA installation flow, showing an install button or iOS-specific instructions when applicable.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout button logic with error handling, session clearing, and retry flow using auth hooks and React Query.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Displays a list of recent transmissions with metadata, loading state, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages a local-only list of personal network entries with add, delete, and persistent localStorage storage.
frontend/src/components/PostLoginInterst: Shows a post‑login loading screen with a timeout state offering retry and session‑clear options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog collecting initial user profile info with validation and submission via a profile‑save hook.
frontend/src/components/PttClipRecorderP: UI for recording, previewing, discarding, and uploading short audio clips with mic error handling.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Push‑to‑talk button handling press/hold interactions and transmit state indicators.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Displays a status badge showing connection, transmitting, or receiving state with appropriate icons and styles.
frontend/src/components/ReceivedClipsPan: Fetches, lists, and plays received audio clips with playback controls and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Shows a warning alert requiring users to acknowledge holding a valid radio license before real-time voice use.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Like useActor but adds detailed error logging, retry logic, and controlled query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks microphone audio levels using Web Audio API and returns current level and active state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user profile with actor-based error and retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Fetches and toggles favorite networks using actor calls and react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and stored identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Provides a hook for starting, stopping, and resetting microphone recordings using MediaRecorder, returning blob data and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Hooks for fetching builtin networks and client-side searching/filtering using React Query and an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Hooks for polling current transmissions and updating Now Hearing activity through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Manages saving, loading, and validating preferred connection settings in sessionStorage with type guards and normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePttClipUpload.ts: Defines a mutation for uploading recorded audio clips to a configured HTTP endpoint with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Handles PWA installation prompts and state detection for installability, iOS conditions, and standalone mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Provides a mutation to perform QRZ callsign lookups via the backend actor if supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useReceivedClips.ts: Fetches and normalizes received audio clips from a configured endpoint with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useRememberLoginPrefe: Stores and retrieves the 'remember login' preference using localStorage with default-on behavior.
Manages server directory sources and cached BrandMeister/AllStar server lists with failure-tolerant fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements a React hook managing WebRTC PTT audio flow, signaling, peer connection setup, and gateway integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and OKLCH theme variables for the app’s radio-console UI aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Renders an informational page describing PTTStar, its purpose, licensing requirements, and creator details.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays a live-updating list of current transmissions with manual refresh and activity status components.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Provides connection configuration UI with presets, tabs, and forms for IAX-DVSwitch and digital voice modes.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Allows browsing networks and talkgroups, selecting entries, saving connections, and navigating to the PTT interface.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page with app introduction, requirements, and getting-started guidance for PTTStar.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Implements the main push‑to‑talk interface, managing WebRTC PTT connections, status, audio levels, and activity lists.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user profile editing, server directory configuration, login preference options, and PTT clip HTTP settings.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Utility functions for detecting, classifying, and extracting messages from backend authorization errors.
frontend/src/utils/clearClientSession.ts: Clears all app‑related localStorage and sessionStorage keys to reset client‑side session state.
frontend/src/utils/connectionPresets.ts: Defines preset metadata for connection types and helper functions for filtering and retrieving preset info.
frontend/src/utils/digitalVoiceGatewayCl: Implements a WebRTC signaling client over WebSocket for connecting to digital voice gateways with support for BrandMeister and TGIF metadata.
frontend/src/utils/gatewayUrlBootstrap.t: Captures gateway-related URL params, stores them in sessionStorage, and infers connection presets. Also tracks whether auto-flow was attempted.
frontend/src/utils/pttClipHttpConfig.ts: Manages localStorage-backed config for PTT clip HTTP URLs with validation helpers. Provides load, save, and URL validation functions.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Generates stable room keys and labels from connection settings using normalized server addresses. Supports IAX, digital voice, and directory-based connections.
frontend/src/utils/serverAddress.ts: Normalizes server addresses for comparison and key generation and provides an equality check. Ensures consistent lowercase, trimmed formatting.
Caches BrandMeister and AllStar server directory lists in localStorage with timestamps. Supports reading, writing, clearing, and checking cache age.
Fetches and parses server lists with timeout handling for BrandMeister and AllStar sources. Includes line-based parsers for each list format.
frontend/src/utils/serverDirectorySource: Manages persistent GitHub source URLs and metadata for server directories with defaults. Supports reading, updating, and resetting sources and metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage stored parameters. Includes utilities for clearing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, spacing, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project status, issues, existing features, and new feature requests related to deploying the app and fixing backend authorization errors.
